traits.name: Grappler
traits.detail: The nuckle has advantage on attack rolls against any target it has grappled. In addition, when grappling a target, the nuckle moves that target with it as it moves.

traits.name: (Scout) Light-footed
traits.detail: You can Disengage or Dash as a bonus action. When an enemy moves adjacent to you, you can spend your reaction to move away up to half your speed.

traits.name: (Scout) You Canâ€™t Hide
traits.detail: You have advantage when trying to detect hidden enemies. Any enemy that you can see is also visible to your allies.

actions.name: Deadly Embrace
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ [14, d6] necrotic damage, and the target is grappled (escape [dc-primary]). Until this grapple breaks, the target is restrained, and the nuckle cannot use its Deadly Embrace.

actions.name: Wilting Breath (recharge 5-6)
actions.detail: Each creature in a 30' cone must make a [dc-primary] CON save or take 31 (9d6) necrotic damage (half damage on save).
